note:
I will add you as a friend if you request.
My only rejections are if you have no posts or have only adverts in your posts (essentially no bots)
Or if your posts are cruel even against evil people (anger and hate is fine but no wishing people die or get bad things happen to them)

fields.name: Head pats welcome
fields.value: I have received one head pats since I joined mastodon. Does anyone read this

fields.name: Hugs and comedy violence welcome
fields.value: I won't hug you if state in your profile it makes you uncomfortable

fields.name: Please like and boost stuff. I like to share
fields.value: I occasionally post my own photos (these will have no link -if they do, they aren't mine)
